item.title: Scope X
item.description:
Title: Scope X
Genre: Action , Indie , Utilities
Developer: CenterPoint Gaming
Publisher: CenterPoint Gaming
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025




About This Software

Scope X is a lightweight zoom and focus tool designed to enhance visual clarity across your entire display.

Quickly toggle magnification, create a personalized focus ring, and fine-tune sensitivity controls‚Äîall from one easy-to-use overlay.

Key Features:

  • Real-Time Magnification ‚Äì Instantly zoom in or out on any part of your screen.

  • Configurable Controls ‚Äì Customize keyboard and mouse shortcuts to suit your preferences.

  • Focus Ring Design ‚Äì Adjust the color, size, and transparency of your visual marker.

  • Universal Compatibility ‚Äì Seamlessly runs alongside other apps and games with zero integrations or dependencies.

  • Overlay-Based Zoom ‚Äì Utilizes screen rendering technology similar to recording and accessibility software. No game modifications, no interference.

item.title: Lies of P: Overture
item.description:
Title: Lies of P: Overture
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: NEOWIZ
Publisher: NEOWIZ
Franchise: NEOWIZ
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025




About This Content

Cross the Bounds of Time

Lies of P: Overture is a dramatic prequel to the acclaimed soulslike action RPG, Lies of P. It transports you to the city of Krat in its final days of haunting, late-19th-century Belle √âpoque beauty. On the brink of the Puppet Frenzy massacre, you follow a legendary Stalker‚Äîa mysterious guide‚Äîthrough untold stories and chilling secrets. As Geppetto‚Äôs deadly puppet, you‚Äôll journey through Krat and its surroundings, uncover hidden backstories, and face epic battles that shape the past and future of Lies of P.

‚ÄúGeppetto‚Äôs puppet‚Ä¶ We need your help.‚Äù

Return to the City of Krat.

Discover Its Unexplored Horror and Splendor.

Venture into a past Krat when its Belle √âpoque elegance faces impending ruin. Explore majestic, never-before-seen locations, from extravagant landmarks on its outskirts to opulent mansions and eerie, haunted ruins.

Confront formidable new enemies and uncover secrets hidden within the city‚Äôs decaying grandeur.

Travel Back in Time.

Meet the Legendary Stalker.

Before the awakening lies the truth. Join Lea, the Legendary Stalker, on her relentless path of vengeance. A veil is lifted to reveal a hidden chapter of Krat's dark past.

Discover untold stories behind both new and familiar characters as you explore the gripping drama and mysteries that shape this rich and haunting world.

Forge New Weapons.

Master New Combat Styles.

Cunning enemies lurk within unfamiliar labyrinths and treacherous terrain, waiting to end your story. Ruthless, punishing, and even majestic, these adversaries will test your mettle. Only the most resourceful, doughty, and daring will prevail.

As you delve deeper into its expanded world you'll unlock powerful new armaments, including a brand-new arsenal of weapon combinations and Legion Arms, giving you unprecedented freedom to forge a combat style uniquely yours.

Overcome Treacherous Odds.

Face intense, high-stakes encounters through Krat‚Äôs labyrinths and various surroundings.

Confront powerful new bosses and enemies as you fight to uncover the mysteries of a world teetering on the edge of collapse.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This product contains violence, blood and gore, as well as fear elements.



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description:
Title: Dragon Is Dead
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: TeamSuneat
Publisher: PM Studios, inc.
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game

Prologue

The black dragon [Guernian], who once faced down the gods, has fallen. From the rift he fled before his death, an unholy energy has spread across the world, and life is undergoing a bizarre mutation. People call it Corruption and live their days in fear, but few know its trustworthy source and full extent.

Player = Successor

You are an immortal warrior, a so-called Successor, chosen by the God of Light [Lu], the God of Fire [Ashuran], and the God of Water [Harnia]. When you die in battle, you return to the source of your lineage and are resurrected, growing stronger through the experience, equipment, and rune power you accumulate along the way. Arriving in Cliffshire, a town of light, the Successors must head to a burial ground where demons are said to be manifesting and follow clues to cleanse the distorted world.

Core Gameplay

The game plays out as 2D platformer action requiring precise dodging and pattern-breaking. Each area is a vertically and horizontally intertwined, multi-layered structure that regenerates in a rogue-lite fashion with different terrain, monster placement, and loot composition on each exploration. When you die, you lose your gold and temporary buffs, but your gear and runes are permanently preserved and become the basis for the next cycle. Defeating bosses yields rune stones that can be used to craft or awaken legendary gear, and artifacts found during exploration can bring both powerful blessings and dangerous curses depending on the combination, providing new tactical tension each time.

The current situation

Corrupted enemies are gradually expanding their territory, threatening neighboring regions. In this chaos, the Black Dawn is leading the Corruption from behind the scenes, but their true purpose is shrouded in mystery. Lore says that only by destroying the [Guernians] will the lost order return, but the deeper you explore, the more you question the truth of even this belief. The closer you get to the citadel, the more you'll come face-to-face with the greater secret that brought the world to its knees.

    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

item.title: Holoidle
item.description:
Title: Holoidle
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Kindred Interactive
Publisher: holo Indie
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

Step into a fantastic world of streaming! Holoidle is a relaxing idle game where you click and strategize to gain Influence and grow your audience. Purchase assets, collect Collab Cards , and keep your chat engaged for perfect efficiency!

Three playable talents for you to choose

  • ü¶à Gawr Gura - The legendary shark idol from Atlantis!

  • ‚öì Houshou Marine - The pirate captain arrives!

  • üíÄ Calliope Mori - The reaper is here to collect souls!

Collect cards from a collection of 100 unique Hololive-themed cards

Earn Holocoins by playing and use them to obtain Collab Cards ‚Äîeach one featuring iconic references and talents from Hololive history.

‚≠ê Rarity System ‚Äì Cards range from One-Star to Four-Star Legendary , with increasing power and synergy effects.

‚ú® Foil Cards ‚Äì Collect 10 copies of a card to unlock a special Foil Version with boosted stats!

üîß Strategize! ‚Äì Some cards enhance assets, while others improve the strength of your overall deck. Combine them to create your own unique strategy!

Maximize Your Influence Gains!

Equip up to six Collab Cards at a time to supercharge your influence generation. Placement matters‚Äîcombine synergies and position cards strategically to turn a modest 10% bonus into game-changing multipliers!

‚ú® Foil Cards = Double the Power! Collect 10 copies of a card to unlock its Foil Version, doubling its effectiveness.

‚ö° Optimize! ‚Äì Experiment with different builds to find the most powerful combinations!

Keep Your Idol Happy!

Your idol needs love and care! Cook meals, clean up, and decorate their home with unlockable furniture to keep them happy and productive.

üíé Holocoins ‚Äì Your idol generates 1 Holocoin every 40 minutes , but keep them happy and they‚Äôll double their earnings to 1 every 20 minutes!
üé® Customize Their Space ‚Äì Unlock and arrange furniture to create the perfect idol retreat.
üç≥ Tend To Their Needs ‚Äì Feed, clean, and interact with your idol to strengthen your bond and boost your progress!

Restart, Reinvent, Rise!

Encore lets you reset your progress while making your next run even stronger!

üîÑ Endless Progression ‚Äì Each encore doubles your base Influence per Second and stacks infinitely.
‚ú® Foil Power-Up ‚Äì A random card in your collection upgrades to a Foil Version , boosting its stats.
üÉè Keep Your Collection ‚Äì All previously earned Collab Cards remain, letting you optimize your strategy with every cycle.

This game is published under CCMC Corp(‚Äª1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(‚Äª2)

This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".

Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

‚Äª1. About CCMC Corp.

CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

‚Äª2. About "holo Indie"

holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.

It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.

For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description:
Title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
Genre: Action , Indie , Simulation
Developer: threeW
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

In a world where the dead turn into zombies, your job is to manage your very own Graveyard! Perform burials and cremations, fulfill visitor requests, manage facilities, and keep your staff and defenses in top shape. But when night falls, everything changes. The dead may rest, but the zombies don‚Äôt. They are coming for your precious work!

Visitor Satisfaction is Key

After processing the bodies, visitors will return to check on their loved ones. Your duty is to keep graves intact while providing fresh flowers and maintaining a welcoming environment. Every visit rewards you with valuable bonuses to help your business thrive.

Visitors can also stop by the Chapel to rest and browse the Souvenir Shop for small keepsakes like candles and incenses. A clean and decorated graveyard encourages greater generosity while donating!

Build your Defenses

Each night, waves of zombies will come with their numbers growing and special zombie types emerging, hungry for freshly buried bodies and for you. From basic defenses like barbed wires and fences to advanced machines like automatic turrets, keep your defenses upgraded, repaired, and fully stocked with ammo to withstand the night.

Trust your Arsenal

With a variety of weapons, including pistols, rifles, shotguns, and your trusty shovel, you are the ultimate force against the Zombies. As you level up, unlock and purchase new weapons to become even stronger. Just make sure to stock up on enough ammo!

Even a Graveyard Can Be Cozy Sometimes!

Use your Farming Area to grow different flowers for profit and vegetables to simply eat and restore your energy and health. With Upgrades, you can even unlock a Grinder to turn zombie parts into Fertilizer. Decorate your Graveyard with benches, lights, and other ornaments to make it truly your own.

Expand and Upgrade Your Facilities

Your graveyard isn‚Äôt just a resting place, it's a business, and every upgrade matters. Expand your burial areas and upgrade your crematorium with more furnaces and automated systems. Improve your water supply , manage resource production , and decorate your grounds to stay ahead of growing demands.

Hire a team of employees to help with day-to-day tasks: the Florist keeps flowers running, the Gravekeeper maintains burials and cremations, the Gardener keeps your farm in check, and the Technician ensures all machines run smoothly.

Every improvement helps you stay one step ahead of both business demands and the undead threat.

Key Features

  • Manage and expand your own graveyard while balancing business and survival

  • Build and maintain defenses against nightly zombie attacks

  • Perform burials, cremations, and keep visitors satisfied with flowers and souvenirs

  • Operate a Chapel with a donation system and a fully stocked Souvenir Shop

  • Hire staff like Florists, Gravekeepers, Gardeners, and Technicians

  • Upgrade facilities including the crematorium, farming area, and water systems

  • Unlock new weapons and enhance your combat skills

  • Customize your graveyard with decorations and functional upgrades

  • Experience a mix of management, strategy, and first-person action
